Description:
Detects creation of a hidden user account on macOS (UserID < 500) or with IsHidden option

Author: Daniil Yugoslavskiy, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Hidden User Creation
Query: sourcetype like 'macos-%' eql select * from _source_ where (((process_path like '%/dscl' and command like '%create%') and (command like '%uniqueid%' and command re '([0-9]|[1-9][0-9]|[1-4][0-9]{2})')) or ((process_path like '%/dscl' and command like '%create%') and (command like '%ishidden%' and (command like '%true%' or command like '%yes%' or command like '%1%'))))
